entries.journal_entry_description: On the planet of Mustafar you have been approached by some sort of spirit. This being has tasked you with destroying a powerful force crystal before it falls in to the hands of evil.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Try to find the spirit that sent you on this quest and find out what the next step needs to be.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: One of the Jedi enclaves is located just West of the center volcano. Find the conduit and wedge the crystal in to it.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You must wait for the conduit to finish charging the crystal.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The conduit is done, retrieve your crystal.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: One of the Jedi enclaves is located to the East of the center volcano, all the way on the edge of the continent.. Find the conduit and wedge the crystal in to it.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You must wait for the conduit to finish charging the crystal.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: The conduit is done, retrieve your crystal.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: One of the Jedi enclaves is located up in upper most North West corner of the entire continent. Find the conduit and wedge the crystal in to it.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: You must wait for the conduit to finish charging the crystal.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: The conduit is done, retrieve your crystal.
